text: Bittangala is a small village in Kodagu district of Karnataka state, India. ==Temples== * Methiyadippara Hanuman Temple, Perumbadi ==Location== Perumpadi is located near Virajpet town on Gonikoppal road.https://www.google.com/maps/place/12%C2%B010'27.9%22N+75%C2%B049'57.7%22E/@12.174425,75.692609,11z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x0!8m2!3d12.174425!4d75.83269 It is located at a distance of 170 km from the port city of Mangalore. ==Administration== Bittangala is administered from Virajpet Taluk. It is five km from Virajpet. ==Suburbs and villages== * Balugodu, 5 km * Ammathi, 8 km * Chembebellur, 8 km ==Schools== * G.H.P.School, Bittangala ==References== Category:Villages in Kodagu district
title: Bittangala
